title: Get the authorization status of a TikTok post

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok post. To obtain the public posts of a TikTok account, use /business/video/list/ . Example: 7123456789123456789 . Note : If the TikTok post doesn't have an authorization code, either because the code is not generated or is deleted, an error will occur.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: item_id
fields.description: The ID of the TikTok post. Example: 7123456789123456789 .

fields.name: auth_code
fields.description: The authorization code for the TikTok post. Example: #1Ea2bcde3fUM/ghijEk/L4mOceft5deFRq6za7JsgnAJ8PB9n1XIr1rC1b/5Rw4= .

fields.name: auth_code_start_time
fields.description: The time when the authorization code becomes valid, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: auth_code_end_time
fields.description: The time when the authorization code expires, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: authorization_days
fields.description: The authorization validity period in days. Example: 30 .

fields.name: auth_code_status
fields.description: The status of the authorization code. Enum values: NOT_USED : The authorization code has been generated but has not been used yet. IN_USE : The authorization code has been generated and is in use now. EXPIRED : The authorization code has been generated and has expired.
